mean_cn: n. 专长，专业，特性，特质
mean_en: an area of work or study that somebody gives most of their attention to and knows a lot about; something that somebody is good at
sentence: I can help you if you have a computer problem. Computers are my speciality.
sentence_trans: 如果你有电脑问题可以来找我，那是我的专长。
word_etyma: special特别的 + ity名词后缀  → speciality 特点
